flavorText: "Our ancestors adapted to this world of metal. Just as they did, we will adapt to this world of evil."

name: Greenhilt Trainee
originalText: {T}: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if Greenhilt Trainee's power is 4 or greater.

rulings.text: Once Greenhilt Trainee’s ability is activated, it will resolve as normal even if Greenhilt Trainee’s power is less than 4 at that time (perhaps because an Equipment attached to it was destroyed).

text: {T}: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Activate only if Greenhilt Trainee's power is 4 or greater.
